titles.title: PRIMATES Act of 2024
Painful Research and Investigations on Monkeys Abused in Taxpayer-funded Experiments Stops Act of 2024
PRIMATES Act of 2024

To amend the Public Health Service Act to prohibit the National Institutes of Health from conducting or supporting research that causes significant pain or distress to a nonhuman primate, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
